title: HoP 282 - Portrait of the Artist - John Buridan
itunes:title: HoP 282 - Portrait of the Artist - John Buridan
description: The hipster’s choice for favorite scholastic, John Buridan, sets out a nominalist theory of knowledge and language, and explains the workings of free will.
